display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wyq1DF11kosQ7kNvwGzD1KU&_nc_oc=Admxv9ikqbyjDevSWfhL4DP0g9IkOqkMP0UkINt2WoHu9sQemsrld_HcMZuRmhUG1Ng&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HnKwDeccZj6mRwFcGtvEPA&oh=00_AfTY32nEfu1tfU8cmRW0UB1L0gLwwiINRaL9iYSySuswRw&oe=68876796)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=f9VwnWLuB8UQ7kNvwGmwv6u&_nc_oc=Adk_Ps4rpJl-x_sE5hMr7FlU0-hEZO-8tk6W3vP3gCNd8ilSkqZ9Dc9D-5tIxXt4OBg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HnKwDeccZj6mRwFcGtvEPA&oh=00_AfQ_KCHIZtmDRnMJ13QgZAUZGj0CHM3VRRW1TYSzKrsi2w&oe=688773AC)



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=u6-XIsMwNfwQ7kNvwG5LQmY&_nc_oc=AdnQK2IXTKbgWXopDFLM1UMT20xNh41o5qbjxwpT2KIXz9Wg5pCWckXwAjZ0oGyEroE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HnKwDeccZj6mRwFcGtvEPA&oh=00_AfSt1HUDyyO9H2_jiHJMvUofEYdCb4lcPC8v_l6y0r_uKw&oe=68875F32)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=GSlqRumNQhwQ7kNvwG1uSAT&_nc_oc=Adm5CRMMLGdj7tEnyew1uTl4dq_MSmMX4GEtf7tVuqg9DmyhnPMkYOWmysjcX-sgzdw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HnKwDeccZj6mRwFcGtvEPA&oh=00_AfSRS0QOGzP6Ns0HYp1JKEqttjwBXrh2saAk_hoTbHQg-g&oe=6887614C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
